utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Hey!

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Good morning, Tiger! I'm making you a nice big breakfast so you can keep up your strength for tonight. You're gonna get me good and pregnant.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: I've got nowhere to go this morning. I'm unemployed! I don't know what I'm gonna do with my life.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Well, I just lost my erection.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: I mean, what am I supposed to do with myself?

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: You're supposed to find your passion in life. You can be whatever you wanna be now. It's exciting.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: But it's all so overwhelming. I don't know where to start.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Hey, wait a second. I can help you with this. You just need to be organized. We can make a list of your qualifications, and categorize jobs by industry. There could be folders and files!

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Hey! This is where your hyper-organized-pain-in-the-ass stuff pays off!

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: I know! My erection is back!

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Joey, can I have a sip of your coffee and a bite of your muffin?

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Okay.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: I'm sorry, it's just, I'm a little short on cash.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: If you want I could loan you some money?

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Oh no, no, no. I learned never to borrow money from friends. No, that's why Richard Dreyfuss and I don't speak anymore.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Oh, hey, how about this? Wanna be an extra on my show?

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: You could do that?

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Yeah, yeah. The pay is pretty good and you could do it for as long as you need.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Oh my god, I'm gonna be on TV!

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Okay, now. I gotta tell you, being on TV isn't as glamorous and exciting as you think.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Oh, really?

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: No it is awesome!

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Hi guys.

utterance.speaker: All
utterance.content: Hello.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Wow! Hey, why are you all dressed up?

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Rachel and I are bringing Emma to Ralph Lauren today to introduce her to everyone. Doesn't she look cute?

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: She sure does. Why does she have a pink bow taped to her head?

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Well, because if one more person says "what a cute little boy" I'm gonna whip them with a car antenna!

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: I think she's gonna be the hit of the office, huh? She's gonna be hotter than peasant blouses and A-line skirts. Can I get a blue bow?

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: How long was I in there?

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Okay. Let us start with the A's. Advertising.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Wait. Advertising! That's a great idea!

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Don't you want to look through the rest?

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: I don't think I have to hear the rest. Advertising makes perfect sense. Sorry you had to waste all this time, though.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: You call eight hours alone with my label maker wasted time? Ooh, now I get to use my shredder!

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: I mean, I can write slogans. I mean, how hard can it be, right? "Cheese. It's milk that you chew." "Crackers. Because your cheese needs a buddy." "A grape. Because who can get a water melon in your mouth?"

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: I got one. "Socks. Because your family's feet deserve the best."

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Honey? Leave it to the pros.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: I actually know someone in advertising. I grew up with this guy who is a vice president at a big agency. Maybe I can get him to meet you? Give me the phone.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: "The phone. Bringing you closer to people...who have phones."

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: "Marriage. It's not for everybody."

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: That went well. Almost everybody knew that she was a girl.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Yeah, after you punched that one guy who got it wrong, word spread.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: I'm just gonna go in my office and pick up some stuff . Who the hell are you!?

utterance.speaker: Guy
utterance.content: Who the hell are you?

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: I'm the hell person whose office this is!

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Good one, Raych.

utterance.speaker: Guy
utterance.content: I'm Gavin Mitchell, the person who's taken over your job.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Excuse me?

utterance.speaker: Gavin
utterance.content: Oh, your baby's so cute. Why did you put a pink bow on a boy?

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Joey, look at me! I'm a nurse!

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Yes you are. I think it may be time for my sponge bath. Sorry, I'm just so used to hitting on the extras. So, are you excited about your scene?

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Yeah! But I'm a little shaky and nervous.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Oh, relax. Don't be. You'll be fine, you'll be fine. They'll probably just make you stand in the back.

utterance.speaker: Director
utterance.content: Okay, okay, okay! You. Here, come here, here. You're gonna take this tray, you're gonna stay on this yellow mark. You're gonna move on "action!" You're gonna walk over to the operating table. You're gonna stop on that blue mark, you're gonna put the tray down. Don't walk too fast! But don't doddle.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Okay, now. What?

utterance.speaker: Director
utterance.content: And...Action!

utterance.speaker: Director
utterance.content: Cut! Cut!

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: I'm sorry, I'm sorry, I'm sorry. I'm just a little nervous.

utterance.speaker: Director
utterance.content: Well, don't be.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Okay, that helps.

utterance.speaker: Director
utterance.content: And...Action!

utterance.speaker: Director
utterance.content: Cut!

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Hey, you know what? Don't worry, Pheebs! It usually takes me three takes too! Alright, eight.

utterance.speaker: Director
utterance.content: And...Action!

utterance.speaker: Interviewer
utterance.content: So, do you have any other question about advertising?

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: No, no. But let me show you what I can do. "Bagels and donuts. Round food for every mood."

utterance.speaker: Interviewer
utterance.content: Monica warned me you might do that. I actually think we might have something for you at the agency.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Really? That's great!

utterance.speaker: Interviewer
utterance.content: It's an unpaid internship.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: It's funny. When you said "unpaid" it sounded like you said "unpaid."

utterance.speaker: Interviewer
utterance.content: Come on now. Monica has a good job. And it's not like you have a family to support.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Actually, we're trying, and I don't think Monica's gonna wanna postpone it. We're supposed to have sex tonight. Actually, she's probably at home naked right now. I tend to keep talking until somebody stops me. I can just picture her on the bed right now.

utterance.speaker: Interviewer
utterance.content: Stop!

utterance.speaker: Interviewer
utterance.content: Okay.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Wait a minute! What do you mean, you're taking over my job?

utterance.speaker: Gavin
utterance.content: Well, while you were on your baby vacation I was doing your job.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: A vacation? My idea of a vacation does not involve something sucking on my nipples until they are raw.

utterance.speaker: Gavin
utterance.content: Clearly you've never been to Sandles Paradise Island.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Alright! Don't get too comfortable there, because I'm back in two weeks! And I want everything back to the way it was. I can't say that I care too much for the way you've rearranged my office.

utterance.speaker: Gavin
utterance.content: I can't say I care too much for that smell you've brought in with you.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Excuse me?

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Rach we have a code brown situation.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Can you please, please take care of it for me?

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Alright, but you have to do one sometime.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Let me just get this straight! So I go have a baby and they send some guy in to do my job?

utterance.speaker: Gavin
utterance.content: Well, there was talk of shutting down Ralph Lauren all together.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: That's right. You're very cheeky for a temp.

utterance.speaker: Gavin
utterance.content: I'm not a temp. I was transferred here from another department.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Oh yeah, what department was that? The Jerk department?

utterance.speaker: Gavin
utterance.content: Oh, they didn't tell me about your quick wit.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Did they mention that I'm rubber and you're glue?

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Oh, hi Mr. Zelner.

utterance.speaker: Mr. Zelner
utterance.content: Rachel, I see you've met Gavin. I must say, when you left us we weren't sure what we were gonna do. But then, Gavin to the rescue. Super Gavi.!

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: That's great. So now, Super Gavin, when I come back where are you planning on flying off to?

utterance.speaker: Gavin
utterance.content: Well, that's up to Mr. Zelner. I'm sure he will make the right decision.

utterance.speaker: Mr. Zelner
utterance.content: Incidentally, when are you coming back?

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Today.

utterance.speaker: Gavin
utterance.content: You said two weeks.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: No, I said today! See, for a superhero, not so much with the listening.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Hey.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Hey. So, what did he say?

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Well, he can be a little rough around the edges, so I'm gonna replace a word he used a lot, with the word "puppy." Okay, so he said: "If your puppy friend doesn't get her puppy act together, I'm gonna fire her mother-puppy ass."

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: I'm sorry, I can't do this. I'm not an actor.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: That's right, you're not. You're a nurse. You're Nurse With Tray.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Joey.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: No, no. Nurse With Tray doesn't know Joey, she doesn't have time for friends. She gets in that operating room and she carries that tray to the doctor, because if she doesn't, people die!

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Who dies?

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Yes, doctor.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Okay.

utterance.speaker: Director
utterance.content: Okay, let's try this one more time.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Hang in there, Man With Eye Patch, your tray is coming!

utterance.speaker: Director
utterance.content: And...Action!

utterance.speaker: Director
utterance.content: The rest of the scene.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Okay, from the top, people!

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Listen. Sudden change of plans. My maternity leave just ended. They told me that if I didn't come back today, they were gonna fire me.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: What? No, that's illegal. I'm gonna have the labor department down her so fast they won't even...

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Alright, alright. Calm down Norma Rae. They didn't actually say that. I'm just afraid if I don't come back right now this guy's gonna try to squeeze me out.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: What about Emma? We don't have a nanny.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: I know. You know, we're just gonna have to figure out a plan tonight. Can you please just take care of her for today?

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Absolutely. Just give me your breast and we'll be on our way.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Come on, I don't know what else to do.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Fine, fine. We'll have fun, won't we? Yes, we will, yes we will.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Ross?

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Huh?

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: You're pretty.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Whatever I decide to do, I'm gonna be starting a career from scratch. It's gonna be a while before I make a living at it. Maybe now is not the right time to be starting a family.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: So you have to tell Monica you don't want to have a baby right now?

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Yeah.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Yeah, Ross is here so...

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Yeah, and I was really hoping that I could hang out. What do you feel like doing?

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: We're gonna have sex.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: I don't feel like having sex. Maybe we can watch a movie or something.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Let me put it this way. We're having sex whether you're here or not.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Pants off Bing!

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Alright. Now that I'm back, why don't you just fill me in on what you've been up to?

utterance.speaker: Gavin
utterance.content: Well, I've changed your screensaver from that picture of *Nsync.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Hey, they were popular when I left!

utterance.speaker: Gavin
utterance.content: Also, I've just been working on this big presentation for tomorrow.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Well, I should be involved in that, so why don't you get me up to speed?

utterance.speaker: Gavin
utterance.content: That's gonna take weeks. Why don't just let me take care of the presentation?

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Oh, no no no no. I see what you're doing here, alright, listen, this is my job buddy. Okay, I've had it for five years, and I know how it works, so why don't you just catch me up!

utterance.speaker: Gavin
utterance.content: Fine.

utterance.speaker: Gavin
utterance.content: Hey, you've been here five years, you figure it out.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Fine, I will. Alright, fill me in!

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Hey.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Hey.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: You have a blue tie that would go with this? Emma spit up on mine.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Oh, yeah. But you have to give it back if I get a job. Of course, by that time in the future ties will be obsolete and we'll all be wearing silver jump suits.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Here's an idea. You walk into a room...take a quick scan!

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Oh god, I have to tell you something. You're not pregnant.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: What are you talking about?

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: That thing that I have to do to make a baby. I faked it.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: What!? You faked it?

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: You know what? I don't need a tie. I mean, it's better, open collar. You know, it's more casual

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Joey, listen. I can't do this, it doesn't make any sense. Yesterday I was a nurse, and today I'm a waitress at a cafe?

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Oh, sometimes we use the same extras for different parts. It's okay.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Well, it's not okay, because I gave a very memorable performance as the nurse. And now suddenly I'm the waitress? That's gonna confuse my fans.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Maybe you are a nurse, but you moonlight as a waitress.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Uhuh. Because I'm a single mother, supporting my two children.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Nice.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Wait a minute. Dr. Drake Ramoray and I work at the same hospital. Wouldn't I come over to say hi to him?

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: No, no. See, you and Drake are having a fight.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: About what?

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: He slept with you and then never called you.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: And I just wanted a new daddy for Davy and Becky.

utterance.speaker: Director
utterance.content: Okay, okay, from the top. And...Action!

utterance.speaker: Man
utterance.content: So, I'm surprised you agreed to have lunch with me.

utterance.speaker: Director
utterance.content: Cut, cut! What are you doing!?

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Yeah, well, I'm very angry at him, because he slept with me and never called me back.

utterance.speaker: Extra
utterance.content: Me too!

utterance.speaker: Another extra
utterance.content: Me too!

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Oh, calm down! She means on the show! We need some new extras around here!

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Yes. Emma and I came in a little early to do research on the presentation. I actually made a few changes, but I think I'm caught up on everything. So ask me anything!

utterance.speaker: Gavin
utterance.content: How do you fix the chair?

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Except that! Oh, hello, Mr. Zelner. We're all ready for our presentation this afternoon.

utterance.speaker: Mr. Zelner
utterance.content: Good, because it's in ten minutes.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: What? I can't do that! I have the baby, and Ross is not gonna pick her up for another hour.

utterance.speaker: Mr. Zelner
utterance.content: Well, then Gavin can give the presentation, okay, we have to do it now. Ralph needs to leave early today. He's going helicopter shopping.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Well, there you go. You win, you win. You get to do the presentation, you'll knock 'em dead, no one will ever remember that I worked here, and then Ralph will buy his helicopter, and Super Gavin will just fly right along side of him!

utterance.speaker: Gavin
utterance.content: You can do the presentation.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: No, I can't, I have a baby.

utterance.speaker: Gavin
utterance.content: I'll watch her.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Why would you do that?

utterance.speaker: Gavin
utterance.content: Because you've worked really hard, and it's your job, and you're a little crazy.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: That's really nice.

utterance.speaker: Gavin
utterance.content: I should tell you that crying women make me very uncomfortable.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Then you're not gonna like what's coming. I'm sorry, I'm sorry, I'm sorry. Thank you, thank you.

utterance.speaker: Gavin
utterance.content: I'm really fine, don't worry, I'm great with children. Gavin Mitchell. Pleased to meet you.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Please don't fire my friend. Just let me talk to her.

utterance.speaker: Director
utterance.content: Okay, okay. But this is her last chance.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Thank you, thank you. How about I do something for you? Tomorrow, I'll bring you a hat, cover up the bald?

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Hey, listen Pheebs. I was just talking to the director, and he was thinking, maybe this time you don't hit Drake, you just wait on the tables?

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: I can't do that. I'm an actor. I have a process.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: You're a masseuse. You have a table with a hole in it.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Wait a minute, I see what's happening here. You're threatened.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: What?

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Yeah, I'm so good in this scene that I'm stealing focus from you. Well, rise to the challenge Tribianni 'cause I just raised the bar. Come join me up here!

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: You faked it? You couldn't have faked it!

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Oh yes you can. You just make the faces and the noises.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Guys can fake it? Unbelievable. The one thing that's ours! Besides, why would you fake it when we're trying to have a baby?

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: That's actually why. Look, I'm starting a whole new career now, and I'm not saying that I don't want to have a baby, I'm just saying maybe we could wait a little while.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Like a month?

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Or a year?

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Really, you want to wait a year?

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: It could be less than a year. I mean, you've heard my stuff. "Pants. Like shorts, but longer." It'll probably be more than a year.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: I really wanna have a baby.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Yeah, me too. Look, I'll just get my old job back.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: No, I want you to have a job that you love. Not statistical analysis and data reconfiguration.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: I quit and you learn what I do?

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: It's just, I think, there's never gonna be a right time to have a baby. I mean, now you're unemployed and in a little while you'll find a new job that'll keep you really busy. There's always gonna be a reason not to do this, but I think once the baby comes, forget about all those reasons.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: I guess. It's always gonna be scary when we have a baby.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: It's gonna be really scary. I mean, god. When we have a baby, there's gonna be so much that we're not able to control. I mean, the apartment's gonna be a mess, I won't have time to clean it. What if the baby gets into the ribbon drawer? Messes up all the ribbons?! What if there's no room for a ribbon drawer, because the baby's stuff takes up all the space!? Where will all the ribbons go!?!

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Should we go make a baby right now before you change your mind?

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Yes, please!

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Oh, and I promise, I will not fake it this time.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: I wish I could say the same. I'm a little shook up!

utterance.speaker: Man
utterance.content: I'm not your brother.
